title: How to Make Sari Sari with Mock Patis

steps.headline: Gather these ingredients and with this ratio: a light-green squash, two ripe tomatoes, one and a half pounds of fatty pork.
steps.description: For seasoning use rock salt, ground black pepper, a clove or two of garlic and mock patis.

steps.headline: With a potato peeler, skin the squash and cut out the seeds.
steps.description: Cut the squash, pork and tomato in bite size pieces.

steps.headline: Put all of the ingredients in a big, dish microwave dish and cook it at medium- low heat for about 90 minutes.
steps.description: After cooking, leave the lid on the dish to further cook the dish - the squash will be translucent and the pork soft.

steps.headline: Every 30 minutes, stir the ingredients and check how the squash is cooking.
steps.description: The squash requires the most cooking and it will be done when is changes from white to translucent.

steps.headline: To make mock patis use small, dried anchovies and soy sauce.
steps.description: Sprinkle a very, small amount of dried anchovies and soy sauce over the other ingredients before cooking them.

text: Gather these ingredients and with this ratio: a light-green squash, two ripe tomatoes, one and a half pounds of fatty pork. For seasoning use rock salt, ground black pepper, a clove or two of garlic and mock patis. With a potato peeler, skin the squash and cut out the seeds. Cut the squash, pork and tomato in bite size pieces. Put all of the ingredients in a big, dish microwave dish and cook it at medium- low heat for about 90 minutes. After cooking, leave the lid on the dish to further cook the dish - the squash will be translucent and the pork soft. Every 30 minutes, stir the ingredients and check how the squash is cooking. The squash requires the most cooking and it will be done when is changes from white to translucent. To make mock patis use small, dried anchovies and soy sauce. Sprinkle a very, small amount of dried anchovies and soy sauce over the other ingredients before cooking them.
